summary: 5 Soundtracks also DLable here: http://tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=41035. Use & listen to them however you like ^^ Previews aivalable in YT vid form. Just go to the vid tab!
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\'

5 Soundtracks arranged in Oblivion style. Which means Data > Music > Battle / Explore / Special & Dungeon. 
These OSTs are originally composed for : http://tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=41035 but some of the songs like Sunny Day suits Skyrim aswell =)


*Edit

Thank you for all the downloads! 200 DLs =D

Soon when i am provided with time i will compose additional songs (already gots ideas, layout & sketches!) aswell as re-master and remix the 5 soundtracks already available for DL. 
Show your support for the upcoming soundtracks by endorsing or / & tracking.

If you know how to convert music to work in Skyrim please say so in the comment section.
author: UltimeciaKnight Mynt
